3D Frost Effect

The shown Frost Effect is a Geometry Node based Effect, which covers Objects with a ice crystal like pattern. The goal was to create something realistic. The animation was done in a short timeframe thats why it lacks some details and refinement. All assets were created from Images I took on Walk.

Björn Martens

Hello, Im a 21 year old Student Artist from Germany. Currently studying Gamedesign at Furtwangen University I enjoy expressing my creativity in Visuals and Sound. I have several years of experience with working in Programs like Blender, After Effects, Davinci Resolve, Unity. I am passionate about doing Art and allways try to improve from my Work and learn new stuff.

Skills

Artistic:

  • 3D Modeling - Blender
  • Texturing & Materials - Blender

Technical:

  • Shaders - Blender, Shader Graph, Unreal, GLSL
  • Rigging - Blender

Programming:

  • Typescript/Javascript
  • C# - Unity
  • Python

My Motivation

I discovered my passion for 3D with Blender through animations for videos I made. Being more of a technical person, I really enjoyed creating procedural stuff in Blender - Materials and Geometry. After creating an AR weather App for my Abitur exam in Unity I started getting more and more into Gamedev. My Goal is to succesfully complete my Gamedesign Studies. After that I want to absolve the motiondesign diploma at Filmakademie Ludwigsburg
